name: Colour Drop
description:
๏ Colour Drop ๏

Colour Drop is an endless game that is highly addictive. The concept behind the game is to match the falling dots to the correct circle in the middle of the screen as it falls, seems easy right?

As your score increases so does the speed of the dots falling, are your reactions quick enough to keep up ?

Tap the screen to rotate the 4 dots clockwise to match the dot falling towards the centre.

Features
๏ 2 Insanely fun game modes!
๏ Hours of fun
๏ Colour Blind Friendly
๏ Leaderboards & Challenges for Game Centre
๏ Invite Friends To Join
๏ Share Your Score Through Your Favourite Social Media
๏ Suitable For All Ages
๏ 3 Awesome Themes*
๏ Able To Test Your Reactions
๏ Easy & Fun
๏ Supports All Devices
๏ Free To Download!

Why not download it and see what all the fuss is about! Have fun whilst playing and be sure to share the game with your friends and family!

Colour Drop is promised to bring you hours of entertainment, so no more boring car rides or boring lunches.

*1 default theme which comes free & 2 themes available to purchase (sold in one purchase along with the removal of ads)
